description:
Non-material amendment to planning permission reference 73238/APP/2021/777, dated 08-09-2022, for the 'Minor material amendment to revise Conditions 2 (Approved Plans), 3 (Compliance with Supporting Documentation), 7 (Landscaping), 9 (Obscure Glazing), 11 (Revised Studio Unit Balcony Details), 12 (Revised Details of Fire / Emergency Door to Block A), 37 (Low and Zero Carbon Technology), 39 (Stacker Spaces) and 43 (Stacker Details) of planning permission ref: 73238/APP/2018/1145, dated 19th December 2019 for 'Demolition of existing buildings, site clearance and redevelopment to provide a mixed use scheme, including residential units, A1 retail space, A3 cafe space and B1 office space, together with car and cycle parking spaces, hard and soft landscaping, refuse and recycling facilities, and public and private amenity space' (as amended by 73238/APP/2021/233 dated 12th March 2021) to allow internal and external layout changes, removal of stackers and reconfiguration of the car parking layout, involving an additional access point on Viveash Close, raising of podium by one level in Block A and B and lowering of podium by one level in Block C and D, reconfiguration of commercial space and revised energy strategy (AMENDED DECEMBER 2021).' 

Amendments propose alterations to the lifts, stair cores, and lobbies; addition of staircases; apartment layout and circulation space alterations; internal repositioning of dwellings; reduction in car parking spaces from 191 to 189 (removal of two spaces); reduction in residential amenity space from 455 sq. m. to 450 sq. m. (reduction of 5 sq. m. or one per cent); 93 sq. m. (four per cent) reduction in workspace floorspace; 17 sq. m. (three per cent) reduction in retail floorspace; alterations to building fenestration.
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall provide 457 residential units, 265 sq. m. (GEA) retail floor space (Use Class Class E(a)), 228 sq. m. (GEA) cafe floor space (Use Class E(b)), and 2,180 sq. m. (GEA) office floor space (Use Class E(g)(i)), together with 189 car parking spaces and 1,070 cycle parking spaces, and shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on the submitted plans, numbers:
20026-AB-05304-Rev-P1 Building A & B - East Elevation Building B
20026-AB-05305-Rev-P2 Building A & B - East Elevation Building A

Notwithstanding the non-material amendment hereby approved to amend condition 2 of 73238/APP/2021/777, dated 08-09-2022, all other conditions relating to planning permission reference 73238/APP/2021/777, dated 08-09-2022, must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission.
The following plans have been superseded or removed from condition 2:
20026-AB-05101-Rev-P1 Building A & B Ground Floor Level 00 Plan
20026-AB-05102-Rev-P2 Building A & B First Floor Level 01 Plan
20026-AB-05103-Rev-P1 Building A & B Second Floor Level 02 Plan
20026-AB-05104-Rev-P1 Building A & B Third Floor Level 03 Plan
20026-AB-05105-Rev-P1 Building A & B Fourth Floor Level 04 Plan
20026-AB-05106-Rev-P1 Building A & B Fifth Floor Level 05 Plan
20026-AB-05107-Rev-P1 Building A & B Sixth Floor Level 06 Plan
20026-AB-05108-Rev-P1 Building A & B Seventh Floor Level 07 Plan
20026-AB-05109-Rev-P1 Building A & B Eighth Floor Level 08 Plan
20026-AB-05110-Rev-P1 Building A & B Ninth Floor Level 09 Plan
20026-AB-05111-Rev-P1Building A & B Tenth Floor Level 10 Plan
